parameters:
"Ugh, this atmosphere... There's an incredible
sense of a curse."\n<Yukine>\F[15]
\n<Shuo>\F[15]\AA[FF]\FF[26]

"Saku, wait here... It's dangerous to get any
closer to the core of the curse."\n<Yukine>\F[4]\AA[F]\FF[26]
"Y-Yes... Please come back quickly."\n<Shuo>\F[4]\AA[FF]\FF[23]

(Let's check out that shrine over there. There
must be something... ...)\FF[23]\F[4]\AA[F]
A

"...There's something inside the shrine... Is this
a stone?"\n<Yukine>\F[4]

In the dilapidated shrine, there is a stone about
the size of a child's head, colored a pale white.\F[4]

"Is this the sacred object of Sakurame Tsuki? The
strong emotions coming from this sacred object
are... eh... 'lonely'? Why?"\n<Yukine>\F[10]

"Ugh, it's starting to emit a terrible curse.
Sakurame Tsuki has noticed us!"\n<Yukine>\F[15]
"Kyaaahh!"\n<Yukine>\F[16]
"Yukine Onee-san!?"\n<Shuo>\FF[27]
"It's okay... I just got a little shock."\n<Yukine>\F[9]\AA[F]\FF[27]

"I wonder if it's impossible to do something about
the sacred object with the small sword and
necklace. If only we had something to break its
core..."\n<Yukine>\F[10]\AA[F]\FF[27]

(It seems impossible to get closer to the
shrine...)

"...There's something inside the shrine... Is this
a stone?"\n<Yukine>\F[4]

(Inside the dilapidated shrine, there is a stone
the size of a child's head, with a pale color. It
feels slightly cold to the touch, yet I can sense
something like body warmth.)\F[4]

"Is this the sacred object of Sakagetsu? The
strong emotions coming from this sacred object
are... eh... 'lonely'? Why?"\n<Yukine>\F[10]

"Ugh, it's starting to emit a terrible curse.
Sakagetsu has noticed us!"\n<Yukine>\F[15]
"With this dagger... ah!"\n<Yukine>\F[19]
"It's no good..."\n<Yukine>\F[15]
"...That's right. Maybe that sword can break it."\n<Yukine>\F[4]

I grip the obtained katana with a prayerful
feeling. The hefty Japanese sword is heavy for me,
but I firmly grasp it.\F[4]\AA[N]
"...Please, break!"\n<Yukine>\F[4]
"Ei!"\n<Yukine>\F[9]
b3
Light deactivate
clear_all_weathers
D_TEXT \ow[0]\c[15]Current_Location: 15
Flashlight off
朔

(It's an old shrine. Inside, there's a shattered
sacred object.)

(There's no longer any sign of a curse on the
crumbled white stone.)
ERS_MAKE_TEMPLATE 18 6 4
"Yukine Onee-san... are you still...?"\n<Shuo>\FF[23]

"Just wait a little bit longer. I'll be right
there."\n<Yukine>\F[1]\AA[F]\FF[23]
"Okay, got it."\n<Shuo>\F[1]\AA[FF]\FF[23]
(I should check out that shrine)\FF[23]\F[4]\AA[F]
"Big sis..."\n<Shuo>\FF[23]

"Sakura, let's get out of here quickly. I'm sure
Sakurakagetsu will find us here."\n<Yukine>\F[7]\AA[F]\FF[23]
"Yeah... big sis... can you hold my hand?"\n<Shuo>\F[7]\AA[FF]\FF[23]

"I'm sorry. It's suffocating here, isn't it...
Let's get out right away."\n<Yukine>\F[8]\AA[F]\FF[23]
(I might have pushed Sakura too hard...)\n<Yukine>\F[8]\AA[F]\FF[23]
Light radius 130 #FFFFFFF
D_TEXT \ow[0]\c[15]Current_Location:_Room_facing_the__garden 15

"Ah, the entrance... As I thought, Sakurakagetsu
found it. We better leave quickly."\n<Yukine>\F[8]
"Yukine big sis, let's go."\n<Shuo>\F[8]\AA[FF]\FF[43]
"Right... we need to find an exit."\n<Yukine>\F[7]\AA[F]\FF[43]

"I remember... I remember now, Yukine Onee-san.
I... long ago, became a shrine maiden for the
gods."\n<Shuo>\FF[23]

"Yes. Sakuragetsuki created this world for you,
sacrificing a tremendous number of lives,
absorbing your parents..."\n<Yukine>\F[10]\AA[F]\FF[23]
"Gods..."\n<Shuo>\F[10]\AA[FF]\FF[23]

"To prevent you from escaping this world, many
people were killed. To fill her own loneliness,
she confined you... and created many evil
spirits."\n<Yukine>\F[4]\AA[F]\FF[23]

"...Let's get out of here, Saku. We really
shouldn't stay in a place like this."\n<Yukine>\F[4]\AA[F]\FF[23]
"Yukine Onee-san..."\n<Shuo>\F[4]\AA[FF]\FF[23]
Light radius 130 #FFFFFFF
D_TEXT \ow[0]\c[15]Current_Location:_Room_facing_the__garden 15

"Ah, the entrance... It seems Sakuragetsuki has
found us. We better leave quickly."\n<Yukine>\F[8]
"Yukine Onee-san, let's go."\n<Shuo>\F[8]\AA[FF]\FF[43]
"Right... we need to find an exit."\n<Yukine>\F[7]\AA[F]\FF[43]

"...That's right. I found this at the shrine, and
I think it's probably a part of the doll."\n<Yukine>\F[3]\AA[F]\FF[43]
"Huh? Aren't they all together already?"\n<Shuo>\F[8]\AA[FF]\FF[22]

"Yes, I thought so too... Well, let's bring this
closer."\n<Yukine>\F[1]\AA[F]\FF[22]
"Huh? My body feels... warm... cozy."\n<Shuo>\F[1]\AA[FF]\FF[40]
"Your complexion has improved, Saku."\n<Yukine>\F[1]\AA[F]\FF[40]

"Really? I don't quite understand, but I feel more
agile."\n<Shuo>\F[1]\AA[FF]\FF[40]

"Maybe it's because all the doll parts are
together now? Anyway, I'm glad you're feeling
better."\n<Yukine>\F[2]\AA[F]\FF[40]

"With this... can I play with Yukine Onee-san
too?"\n<Shuo>\F[2]\AA[FF]\FF[22]
"Yes. Once we get outside, let's play together."\n<Yukine>\F[2]\AA[F]\FF[22]
"Yay!"\n<Shuo>\F[2]\AA[FF]\FF[45]

(Now that the doll's body is complete. The source
of the curse has been destroyed, and now we need
to retrieve Saku's physical body and find an exit
to return to the original world.)\FF[45]\F[1]\AA[F]
